This is shameful. For every worker who has to dip into savings, darken the doors of a payday lender, or apply for unemployment, this is a dark day in this country and political games in Washington are to blame. #TrumpShutdown END
No wall, no matter how high or wide, will help that American worker get their finances back on track or help them run from the cycle of debt they've been trapped in. Thanks #TrumpShutdown!

The payday loan industry is having a field day with the #TrumpShutdown, taking advantage of people desperate for an infusion of cash to pay bills. We all know how that ends-endless cycles of debt for some, repossessed cars, financial ruin for others. https://on.mktw.net/2Fp8z4C
A wall will not pay them for the hours the #TrumpShutdown has taken from them or feed their families or buy their medicine in the meantime.

On top of missed paychecks for federal workers, there are also 1000s of hourly workers who work in the cafeterias or on the custodial staff at these agencies who will not get backpay. The #TrumpShutdown is leaving them even less economically secure.

What many in Washington don’t understand is that the average American can’t miss a paycheck without dipping in to savings. And for far too many, there are no savings to dip into or parent to ask for money from.

THREAD: From men and women of the Coast Guard working in Mobile, to National Park Service rangers in Selma to NASA workers and contractors in Huntsville, thousands of Alabama workers will go without paychecks today because of the #TrumpShutdown!
